graph_title: Early school leaving rate of the 18-24 age group
indicator_name: Early school leaving rate of the 18-24 age group

sources.url_text: Survey on the population in relation to activity

indicador_disponible: Early school leaving rate of the 18-24 age group
objetivo_global: 4- Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
meta_global: 4.1 By 2030, ensure that all girls and boys complete free, equitable and quality primary and secondary education leading to relevant and effective learning outcomes
definicion: Percentage of the population that has completed at most the first stage of secondary  education and is not pursuing any further study or training
formula:
$$PP_{dropout}^{t}  = \frac{P_{dropout,18-24}^{t}}{P_{18-24}^{t}}$$

where:

$P_{dropout,18-24}^{t} =$ population aged 18 to 24 who have completed at most the first stage of secondary education and have not continued any further study or training in the year $t$

$P_{18-24}^{t} =$ population aged 18 to 24 in the year $t$

es.indicador_disponible: Early school leaving rate of the 18-24 age group
es.objetivo_global: 4- Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
es.meta_global: 4.1 By 2030, ensure that all girls and boys complete free, equitable and quality primary and secondary education leading to relevant and effective learning outcomes
es.definicion: Porcentaje de población que ha completado como máximo la primera etapa de la educación  secundaria y no sigue ningún estudio o formación
es.formula:
$$PP_{abandono}^{t}  = \frac{P_{abandono\, 18-24}^{t}}{P_{18-24}^{t}}$$

donde:

$P_{abandono\, 18-24}^{t} =$ población de 18 a 24 años que ha completado como máximo la primera etapa de la educación secundaria y no ha seguido ningún estudio o formación en el año $t$

$P_{18-24}^{t} =$ población de 18 a 24 años en el año $t$
